sentences.sentence: Disembowelment or evisceration is the removing of some or all of the vital organs, usually from the abdomen.
sentences.translation: 剜刑就是剜除某些或全部重要的器官，通常是从腹部。

sentences.sentence: Very quickly the meat line trundles away from me: legs off, skin pulled away, disembowelment, the headless carcass sawn in half.
sentences.translation: 很快肉类生产线远离了我：卸腿，剥皮，剖腹，无头的尸体正锯到一半。
